entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 20S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
SOUTHEAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN RAIN LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

RAIN
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY WITH A CHANCE OF RAIN IN THE MORNING, THEN MOSTLY SUNNY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS AROUND 60

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 50S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 60S
